name: lockAndKey
postCreateCommand: NONINTERACTIVE=1 /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" && echo 'eval "$(/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv)"' >> /home/vscode/.bashrc && echo "alias bazel='bazelisk'" >> /home/vscode/.bashrc && echo "alias c='clear'" >> /home/vscode/.bashrc && echo "alias bb='bazel build //...'" >> /home/vscode/.bashrc && echo "alias bbt='bazel test //...'" >> /home/vscode/.bashrc && echo "alias bbf='bazel run //tools/linting:format'" >> /home/vscode/.bashrc && /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew/bin/brew install bazelisk isort black mypy buildifier
